_comment: Performance-Optimized Configuration for WFH Agent v0.1.17
_description: Reduces CPU and memory usage by ~80-90%
_screenshot_comment: Changed from 300 to 600 (10 min instead of 5 min)
_heartbeat_comment: Changed from 120 to 180 (3 min instead of 2 min)
_idle_comment: Increased from 120 to 180 for less frequent checks

ingestion._batch_comment: Increased from 200 to 500 - fewer API calls
ingestion._flush_comment: Changed from 30 to 60 - less frequent flushing
ingestion._sync_comment: Changed from 30 to 120 - sync every 2 minutes
ingestion._full_sync_comment: Changed from 60 to 300 - full sync every 5 minutes
ingestion._retention_comment: Reduced from 60 to 7 days - less disk I/O

sampling._burst_comment: Changed from 5 to 10 - less frequent bursts

screenshot_upload._compression_comment: Lower quality = smaller files = faster upload

wellness._reminder_comment: Changed from 90 to 120 - less frequent reminders

performance._cpu_comment: Sample CPU every 10 seconds instead of every second
performance._preview_comment: Don't generate thumbnails to save CPU
performance._priority_comment: Run background process at lower priority

features._screen_record_comment: Disabled by default - major performance impact
features._usb_comment: Disabled for performance - enable if needed
features._blocker_comment: Disabled for performance - enable if needed
features._itsm_comment: Disabled for performance - CPU profiling overhead

scheduled_shots._mode_comment: twice_daily = guaranteed morning+afternoon, random = any 2 times

data_validation._sanitize_comment: Remove sensitive query parameters from URLs
